name: Caffeine
description: An extension for tigris to prevent lock screen and suspend

name: Session Manager
description: An extension for tigris that gives the options to lock, logout, shutdown, reboot, suspend and hibernate

name: Bookmarks
description: An extension for tigris to manage web bookmarks

name: Clipper
description: An extension for tigris to copy text and images
author: Whiskers Apps

name: Emoji Picker
description: An extension for tigris to pick emojis
author: Whiskers Apps
